abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting.
abilities.description:
The molydeus's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma. It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
* At will: dispel magic, polymorph, telekinesis, teleport
* 3/day: lightning bolt
* 1/day: imprisonment

abilities.name: Legendary Resistance
abilities.description: If the molydeus fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

abilities.name: Magic Resistance.
abilities.description: The molydeus has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

abilities.name: Magic Weapons.
abilities.description: The molydeus's weapon attacks are magical.
